preparation.raw_text:
1. Measure 16.25 g of barium oxide (BaO) and place it in a clean, dry mixing bowl. 
 2. Measure 5.47 g of gadolinium oxide (Gd2O3) and add it to the bowl. 
 3. Measure 33.75 g of tungsten oxide (WO3) and add to the mix. 
 4. Using a mortar and pestle or a mechanical mixer, thoroughly mix the powdered components to achieve a uniform blend.
